page.title: 03INDUSTRY IN OAKHAM
page.content:
Oakham's Industry has a wide range of products, varying from supplying tractor parts to clothing and fabrics. There is an Industrial Estate on the edge of Oakham.
One of the biggest industries in Oakham is{MARKON}producing electrical equipment and generators. It started in about 1970. Beginning as two men working in a garage, it has been built up to be a leading manufacturer of electrical goods in Leicestershire. {BELTON TRANSPORT}and {LEX WILKINSON have large transport depots.{CORAHS } manufacture many of the clothing ranges for Marks and Spencer.{SUPERFOS is a large factory which}produces a large range of plastic products.
